song.englishname: Am I Ever Gonna Find Out

english.segment1: silence is golden. but I think it's gonna kill me now. everything I've seen. never seems to fail me now. no one told me that the world could fall through yeah
english.segment2: in between this am I gonna find a way. to defeat this living inside yesterday. I'm alive I think it's time to live. like I am. am I ever gonna find it. am I ever gonna find it. am I ever gonna find out
english.segment3: patience can wait for now. I think I've waited for too long. you always gave a choice. well I know right to be wrong. all my life has been slipping through your hands yeah
english.segment4: in between this am I gonna find a way. to defeat this living inside yesterday. I'm alive I think it's time to live. like I am. am I ever gonna find it. am I ever gonna find it. am I ever gonna find out
